DOC.HEADLINE: THE WEEK AHEAD : BRUSSELS ; SLOVENIA LOOKS WEST
DOC.TEXT: Slovenia continues its low-profile efforts to seek greater integration with Western Europe when the country ' s prime_minister , Janez Drnovsek , visits North_Atlantic_Treaty_Organization headquarters here Wednesday to sign the alliance ' s Partnership for Peace framework document . The move marks the first such link between the Western Alliance and a country that was once part of Yugoslavia . It also would provides Slovenia with the ability to develop joint military planning and training exercises as well as_to receive technical assistance . Earlier this month , Slovenia signed an agreement with the European Union ' s statistical office in Luxembourg to unify its system of presenting statistics with that of the European Union .
